heading: Wednesday Night
text: Chnace of snow showers north, mainly late.
temperature: Zero to 10 above, cold spots around 5 below

heading: Thursday
text: Chance of early snow showers north, otherwise clouds decreasing.
temperature: Low to mid 20s north, mid to upper 20s south

heading: Thursday Night
temperature: Zero to 10 below, cold spots around 15 below

heading: Friday
text: Mostly to partly sunny. Chance of a late-day snow shower in the St. Lawrence Valley.
